meanings.sent1: The unplucked apples hung on the tree, waiting to be picked.
meanings.sent2: The farmer noticed the unplucked flowers in the field.
meanings.sent3: The unplucked berries were playing hide and seek with the birds.
meanings.sent4: Her unplucked talent shone brightly in the school play.
meanings.sent5: The unplucked fruits glistened in the morning sun.

meanings.sent1: The unplucked feathers on the bird were a sign of its health.
meanings.sent2: She admired the unplucked petals of the flower in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The unplucked guitar strings hummed a silent melody.
meanings.sent4: His unplucked courage surprised everyone in the room.
meanings.sent5: The unplucked hairs on the cat's back stood on end.

meanings.sent1: The unplucked weeds in the garden grew wild and free.
meanings.sent2: The unplucked documents cluttered the desk, waiting to be sorted.
meanings.sent3: The unplucked toys in the room seemed to multiply overnight.
meanings.sent4: Her unplucked memories of childhood brought a smile to her face.
meanings.sent5: The unplucked secrets of the old house intrigued the new owners.
